title: Template Configuration
description: Configuration file created after template initialization. Records initialization metadata and prevents re-initialization.

initialized.description: Whether the template has been initialized (always true when file exists)

initializedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when initialization occurred (e.g., '2026-01-02T12:30:45.123Z')

packageName.description: The npm package name chosen by the user (e.g., '@acme/ui' or 'acme-ui')

clientName.description: The client/company name chosen by the user

primaryColour.description: The primary brand colour as hex code (e.g., '#3b82f6')

description.description: The project description chosen by the user

templateVersion.description: The version of the template that was initialized (semver format)

examples.description: Acme's design system for web and mobile
Modern design system for My Company's products
